summary: Whoever said dog is man's best friend never met Mij! Mij is a cute, cuddly pet shop otter who captures the heart of Graham Merill (Bill Travers). It doesn't take Graham long to realize that... See full summary »
cast: Bill Travers|Virginia McKenna|Peter Jeffrey|Jameson Clark|Helena Gloag|Willie Joss|Roddy McMillan|Jean Taylor Smith|Christopher Benjamin|Kevin Collins|Archie Duncan|June Ellis|Philippa Gail|Tommy Godfrey|Walter Hall|Bill Horsley|Phil McCall|Philip Morant|Michael O'Halloran|John Young|James Gibson
title: El círculo resplandeciente
